wikipedia_page.main: Robert Sinclair Knox,  (2 March 1881 – 25 January 1963) was an officer in the Royal Inniskilling Fusiliers in the First World War. He was one of seven British officers to be awarded the Distinguished Service Order (DSO) four times during the conflict.

response: * Robert Sinclair Knox, First World War British Army officer
*Temp Major Robert Sinclair Knox, Royal Inniskilling Fusiliers
